site.name: OneDevKit
site.description: Free online developer tools for everyday tasks. JSON formatter, Base64 encoder, URL encoder, JWT decoder, hash generator, timestamp converter, password generator, UUID generator, and more.
site.metaDescription: A collection of free, privacy-focused developer tools. All processing happens in your browser - no data is sent to servers.

common.dragDrop: Drag & drop or click to upload
common.privacy: Your data never leaves your browser

json-formatter.name: JSON Formatter
json-formatter.description: Format, validate, and beautify JSON data instantly. Supports minification and syntax highlighting.
json-formatter.metaTitle: JSON Formatter & Validator - Free Online Tool | OneDevKit
json-formatter.metaDescription: Free online JSON formatter and validator. Beautify, minify, and validate JSON with syntax highlighting. No signup required, works offline.
json-formatter.keywords: json formatter, json validator, json beautifier, format json online, json lint, json parser, beautify json, minify json

steps.title: Paste Your JSON
steps.description: Paste your JSON data into the input area on the left.

steps.title: Format or Validate
steps.description: Click 'Format' to beautify your JSON, or 'Minify' to compress it.

steps.title: Copy the Result
steps.description: Copy the formatted JSON using the copy button.

faq.question: Is this JSON formatter free?
faq.answer: Yes, completely free with no signup required. Use it as many times as you want.

faq.question: Is my JSON data secure?
faq.answer: Yes, all processing happens in your browser. Your data is never sent to any server.

faq.question: What's the difference between format and minify?
faq.answer: Format adds indentation and line breaks for readability. Minify removes all whitespace to reduce file size.

base64-encoder.name: Base64 Encoder
base64-encoder.description: Encode text to Base64 or decode Base64 to readable text. Supports file uploads and URL-safe encoding.
base64-encoder.metaTitle: Base64 Encoder & Decoder - Free Online Tool | OneDevKit
base64-encoder.metaDescription: Free Base64 encoder and decoder. Convert text to Base64 or decode Base64 strings. Supports file uploads and URL-safe encoding.
base64-encoder.keywords: base64 encoder, base64 decoder, base64 converter, encode base64, decode base64 online

steps.title: Enter Text or Upload File
steps.description: Type or paste your text, or upload a file to encode.

steps.title: Choose Operation
steps.description: Select 'Encode' to convert to Base64, or 'Decode' to convert from Base64.

steps.title: Copy Result
steps.description: Copy the result using the copy button.

faq.question: What is Base64 encoding?
faq.answer: Base64 is a way to encode binary data as ASCII text. It's commonly used for embedding images in HTML/CSS or transmitting data in APIs.

faq.question: Can I encode files?
faq.answer: Yes, you can upload files and encode them to Base64 format.

url-encoder.name: URL Encoder
url-encoder.description: Encode special characters for URLs or decode URL-encoded strings. Essential for web development and API work.
url-encoder.metaTitle: URL Encoder & Decoder - Free Online Tool | OneDevKit
url-encoder.metaDescription: Free URL encoder and decoder. Encode special characters for URLs or decode URL-encoded strings. Essential for web development.
url-encoder.keywords: url encoder, url decoder, percent encoding, urlencode online, url escape, encode url parameters

steps.title: Enter Your URL or Text
steps.description: Paste the URL or text you want to encode or decode.

steps.title: Encode or Decode
steps.description: Click 'Encode' to percent-encode special characters, or 'Decode' to convert back.

steps.title: Copy Result
steps.description: Copy the encoded or decoded result.

faq.question: Why do I need to URL encode?
faq.answer: URLs can only contain certain characters. Special characters like spaces, &, and = must be encoded to be safely transmitted in URLs.

jwt-decoder.name: JWT Decoder
jwt-decoder.description: Decode and inspect JSON Web Tokens (JWT). View header, payload, and verify token structure instantly.
jwt-decoder.metaTitle: JWT Decoder & Inspector - Free Online Tool | OneDevKit
jwt-decoder.metaDescription: Free JWT decoder and inspector. Decode JSON Web Tokens to view header, payload, and signature. Debug authentication issues easily.
jwt-decoder.keywords: jwt decoder, jwt debugger, json web token decoder, jwt parser, decode jwt online, jwt inspector

steps.title: Paste Your JWT
steps.description: Paste the JSON Web Token you want to decode.

steps.title: View Decoded Parts
steps.description: See the header, payload, and signature sections decoded.

steps.title: Analyze Claims
steps.description: Review the token claims, expiration time, and other data.

faq.question: Is it safe to decode my JWT here?
faq.answer: Yes, the JWT is decoded entirely in your browser. Nothing is sent to any server.

faq.question: Can this tool verify JWT signatures?
faq.answer: This tool decodes and displays JWT contents. For signature verification, you need the secret key which should never be shared.

password-generator.name: Password Generator
password-generator.description: Generate secure, random passwords for your accounts. Cryptographically secure with customizable options.
password-generator.metaTitle: Password Generator - Create Strong Passwords | OneDevKit
password-generator.metaDescription: Generate secure, random passwords instantly. Customize length and character types. Cryptographically secure random generation.
password-generator.keywords: password generator, random password, secure password generator, strong password creator, generate password online

steps.title: Set Password Length
steps.description: Choose how long you want your password to be (recommended: 16+ characters).

steps.title: Select Character Types
steps.description: Include uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols for stronger passwords.

steps.title: Generate and Copy
steps.description: Click generate and copy your new secure password.

faq.question: How secure are the generated passwords?
faq.answer: Passwords are generated using cryptographically secure random number generation in your browser.

faq.question: What makes a strong password?
faq.answer: A strong password is at least 12 characters long and includes a mix of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols.

uuid-generator.name: UUID Generator
uuid-generator.description: Generate random UUIDs (v4) instantly. Create unique identifiers for databases, APIs, and applications.
uuid-generator.metaTitle: UUID Generator - Generate Random UUIDs | OneDevKit
uuid-generator.metaDescription: Generate random UUID v4 identifiers instantly. Create unique IDs for databases, APIs, and applications. Bulk generation supported.
uuid-generator.keywords: uuid generator, guid generator, random uuid, uuid v4, unique id generator, generate uuid online

steps.title: Generate UUID
steps.description: Click the generate button to create a new random UUID.

steps.title: Bulk Generate
steps.description: Enter a quantity to generate multiple UUIDs at once.

steps.title: Copy UUIDs
steps.description: Copy individual UUIDs or all generated UUIDs.

faq.question: What is a UUID?
faq.answer: A UUID (Universally Unique Identifier) is a 128-bit identifier that's virtually guaranteed to be unique across all systems.

faq.question: What is UUID v4?
faq.answer: UUID v4 is randomly generated, making it ideal for most use cases where you need a unique identifier.

hash-generator.name: Hash Generator
hash-generator.description: Generate MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, and SHA-512 hashes from text. Useful for checksums and data integrity verification.
hash-generator.metaTitle: Hash Generator - MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512 | OneDevKit
hash-generator.metaDescription: Generate MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, and SHA-512 hashes from text. Free online hash generator for checksums and data integrity.
hash-generator.keywords: hash generator, md5 generator, sha256 generator, sha1 hash, sha512 online, checksum generator, hash calculator

steps.title: Enter Text
steps.description: Type or paste the text you want to hash.

steps.title: View Hashes
steps.description: See MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, and SHA-512 hashes generated instantly.

steps.title: Copy Hash
steps.description: Copy the hash you need using the copy button.

faq.question: Which hash algorithm should I use?
faq.answer: For security purposes, use SHA-256 or SHA-512. MD5 and SHA-1 are considered weak for security but fine for checksums.

faq.question: Can I reverse a hash?
faq.answer: No, hashes are one-way functions. You cannot reverse a hash to get the original input.

lorem-ipsum.name: Lorem Ipsum
lorem-ipsum.description: Generate placeholder text for your designs, mockups, and prototypes in paragraphs, sentences, or words.
lorem-ipsum.metaTitle: Lorem Ipsum Generator - Placeholder Text | OneDevKit
lorem-ipsum.metaDescription: Generate Lorem Ipsum placeholder text for designs and mockups. Choose paragraphs, sentences, or words.
lorem-ipsum.keywords: lorem ipsum generator, placeholder text, dummy text generator, lipsum, sample text generator

steps.title: Choose Type
steps.description: Select paragraphs, sentences, or words.

steps.title: Set Amount
steps.description: Enter how many units of text you need.

steps.title: Generate and Copy
steps.description: Generate the text and copy it to your clipboard.

faq.question: What is Lorem Ipsum?
faq.answer: Lorem Ipsum is placeholder text used in design and publishing to fill space before final content is available.

qr-code-generator.name: QR Code Generator
qr-code-generator.description: Generate QR codes for URLs, text, and other data. Create scannable codes that work with any smartphone.
qr-code-generator.metaTitle: QR Code Generator - Create Free QR Codes | OneDevKit
qr-code-generator.metaDescription: Generate QR codes for URLs, text, WiFi, and more. Free QR code generator with customizable colors and sizes.
qr-code-generator.keywords: qr code generator, create qr code, qr code maker, free qr code, generate qr code online, qr code creator

steps.title: Enter Content
steps.description: Enter a URL, text, or other data for your QR code.

steps.title: Customize
steps.description: Adjust size and colors if desired.

steps.title: Download
steps.description: Download your QR code as an image.

faq.question: What can I encode in a QR code?
faq.answer: You can encode URLs, plain text, contact information, WiFi credentials, and more.

faq.question: What size QR code should I use?
faq.answer: For print, use at least 300x300 pixels. For screens, 200x200 is usually sufficient.

timestamp-converter.name: Timestamp Converter
timestamp-converter.description: Convert Unix timestamps to human-readable dates and vice versa. Supports multiple date formats and timezones.
timestamp-converter.metaTitle: Unix Timestamp Converter - Date to Timestamp | OneDevKit
timestamp-converter.metaDescription: Convert Unix timestamps to human-readable dates and vice versa. Support for multiple date formats and timezones.
timestamp-converter.keywords: unix timestamp converter, epoch converter, timestamp to date, date to timestamp, unix time converter

steps.title: Enter Timestamp or Date
steps.description: Enter a Unix timestamp or select a date and time.

steps.title: Convert
steps.description: See the conversion between timestamp and human-readable date.

steps.title: Copy Result
steps.description: Copy the converted value.

faq.question: What is a Unix timestamp?
faq.answer: A Unix timestamp is the number of seconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970 (UTC).

regex-tester.name: Regex Tester
regex-tester.description: Test and debug regular expressions in real-time. See matches highlighted, capture groups, and detailed explanations.
regex-tester.metaTitle: Regex Tester & Debugger - Test Regular Expressions | OneDevKit
regex-tester.metaDescription: Test and debug regular expressions in real-time. See matches highlighted with capture groups. Free online regex tester.
regex-tester.keywords: regex tester, regular expression tester, regex debugger, regex validator, test regex online, regex checker

steps.title: Enter Pattern
steps.description: Type your regular expression pattern.

steps.title: Add Test String
steps.description: Enter the text you want to test against.

steps.title: See Matches
steps.description: View highlighted matches and capture groups in real-time.

faq.question: What regex flavor is used?
faq.answer: This tool uses JavaScript's built-in regex engine, which follows ECMAScript standards.

color-picker.name: Color Picker
color-picker.description: Pick colors and convert between HEX, RGB, HSL, and HSV formats. Generate color palettes and copy values instantly.
color-picker.metaTitle: Color Picker & Converter - HEX, RGB, HSL | OneDevKit
color-picker.metaDescription: Pick colors and convert between HEX, RGB, HSL, and HSV formats. Generate color palettes for your designs.
color-picker.keywords: color picker, hex to rgb, rgb to hex, color converter, hsl converter, color palette generator

steps.title: Pick a Color
steps.description: Use the color picker or enter a color value.

steps.title: View Conversions
steps.description: See the color in HEX, RGB, HSL, and HSV formats.

steps.title: Copy Values
steps.description: Copy any color format to use in your projects.

faq.question: What's the difference between RGB and HSL?
faq.answer: RGB (Red, Green, Blue) defines colors by mixing light. HSL (Hue, Saturation, Lightness) is more intuitive for adjusting colors.

diff-checker.name: Diff Checker
diff-checker.description: Compare two texts and see the differences highlighted. Find additions, deletions, and modifications instantly.
diff-checker.metaTitle: Diff Checker - Compare Text Online | OneDevKit
diff-checker.metaDescription: Compare two texts and see differences highlighted. Find additions, deletions, and changes. Free online diff tool.
diff-checker.keywords: diff checker, text compare, compare text online, diff tool, text difference, compare files online

steps.title: Enter Changed Text
steps.description: Paste the modified text in the right panel.

steps.title: View Differences
steps.description: See additions in green and deletions in red.

faq.question: Can I compare code?
faq.answer: Yes, this tool works great for comparing code, configuration files, or any text content.

markdown-preview.description: Write Markdown and see live preview. Supports GitHub Flavored Markdown with syntax highlighting and export options.

markdown-preview.metaDescription: Write Markdown with live preview. Supports GitHub Flavored Markdown, tables, code blocks, and more.

steps.title: Export

faq.question: What Markdown features are supported?
faq.answer: We support GitHub Flavored Markdown including tables, task lists, code blocks with syntax highlighting, and more.

word-counter.name: Word Counter
word-counter.description: Count words, characters, sentences, and paragraphs instantly. Get reading time and speaking time estimates.
word-counter.metaTitle: Word Counter - Count Words & Characters | OneDevKit
word-counter.metaDescription: Count words, characters, sentences, and paragraphs instantly. Get reading and speaking time estimates. Free online word counter.
word-counter.keywords: word counter, character count, word count online, letter counter, text counter, count words in text

steps.title: Enter Your Text
steps.description: Type or paste your text into the input area.

steps.title: View Statistics
steps.description: See word count, character count, sentences, and paragraphs.

steps.title: Check Time Estimates
steps.description: View estimated reading and speaking time.

faq.question: How is reading time calculated?
faq.answer: Reading time is based on an average reading speed of 200 words per minute.

faq.question: Does it count spaces?
faq.answer: Character count shows both with and without spaces.

faq.answer: UPPERCASE, lowercase, Title Case, Sentence case, camelCase, PascalCase, snake_case, kebab-case, and more.

image-compressor.description: Compress images to exact file size (20KB, 50KB, 100KB). Perfect for passport photos, job applications, and government forms.
image-compressor.metaTitle: Image Compressor to Specific KB Size | OneDevKit
image-compressor.metaDescription: Compress images to exact file size - 20KB, 50KB, 100KB. Perfect for passport photos, job applications, and government forms. Free, private.
image-compressor.keywords: image compressor, compress image to 20kb, compress image to 50kb, reduce image size, image size reducer, compress photo online

steps.title: Upload Image
steps.description: Click or drag to upload your image (JPG, PNG).

steps.title: Select Target Size
steps.description: Choose 20KB, 50KB, 100KB, or enter a custom size.

steps.title: Download
steps.description: Download your compressed image.

faq.question: Why compress to specific KB?
faq.answer: Many government forms, job applications, and online services have strict file size limits like 20KB or 50KB.

faq.question: Will quality be affected?
faq.answer: The tool finds the best balance between file size and quality. For very small sizes, some quality loss is unavoidable.

faq.question: Is my image uploaded to a server?
faq.answer: No, all processing happens in your browser. Your images never leave your device.

passport-photo.name: Passport Photo
passport-photo.description: Create passport and visa photos for any country. Resize to exact dimensions and compress to required file size.
passport-photo.metaTitle: Passport Photo Maker - Create Passport Photos | OneDevKit
passport-photo.metaDescription: Create passport and visa photos for any country. Resize to exact dimensions (2x2 inches, 35x45mm). Free passport photo maker.
passport-photo.keywords: passport photo maker, passport photo size, visa photo, 2x2 passport photo, 35x45mm photo, passport photo online

steps.title: Select Country
steps.description: Choose your country or document type for correct specifications.

steps.title: Upload Photo
steps.description: Upload a clear, front-facing photo with good lighting.

steps.title: Adjust and Download
steps.description: Use zoom and position controls, then download your passport photo.

faq.question: What countries are supported?
faq.answer: We support USA, India, UK, Schengen, Canada, Australia, China, Japan, Singapore, and custom sizes.

faq.question: Will my photo be accepted officially?
faq.answer: This tool helps with sizing and compression. Ensure your original photo meets all official requirements.

faq.question: What is the print layout feature?
faq.answer: Download a 4x6 inch layout with multiple passport photos for printing at home or a photo shop.

social-media-resizer.description: Resize images for Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, YouTube, Pinterest, TikTok, Snapchat, Discord, Twitch, Threads, WhatsApp. Batch processing, custom sizes, background fill.

social-media-resizer.metaDescription: Resize images for all social media platforms. Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, YouTube, TikTok, and more. Free with batch processing.
social-media-resizer.keywords: social media image resizer, instagram photo size, linkedin image size, twitter image dimensions, facebook cover photo size, resize image for social media

steps.title: Upload Image
steps.description: Upload the image you want to resize.

steps.title: Select Platform & Size
steps.description: Choose the social media platform and specific size preset.

steps.title: Adjust and Download
steps.description: Use zoom, pan, rotate, and filters, then download your resized image.

faq.question: What platforms are supported?
faq.answer: Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter/X, YouTube, Pinterest, TikTok, Snapchat, Discord, Twitch, Threads, WhatsApp, and custom sizes.

faq.question: Can I resize multiple images?
faq.answer: Yes, batch processing is supported. Upload multiple images and resize them all at once.

faq.question: What editing features are available?
faq.answer: Zoom, pan, rotate, flip, brightness, contrast, saturation, border, circle crop, and background color.
